publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2812 Mr Duncan McNeil: Euro 2008-That the Parliament welcomes the announcement that the Scottish Football Association and the Football Association of Ireland are to launch a joint bid to host the Euro 2008 football championships; notes that every major party in the Parliament has, at least in the past if not at present, supported such a joint bid; further notes the potential of the bid to bring all the benefits for tourism and the economy that would have resulted from a solo bid by Scotland without burdening the country with four expensive and unneeded 30,000-seater stadiums; looks forward to the opportunity of working and renewing ties with our Irish neighbours, and urges the whole country to back the bid. Supported by: Mr John McAllion*, Bristow Muldoon*, Johann Lamont*, Trish Godman*, Rhoda Grant*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Margaret Jamieson*

S1M-2812 Mr Duncan McNeil: Euro 2008-That the Parliament welcomes the announcement that the Scottish Football Association and the Football Association of Ireland are to launch a joint bid to host the Euro 2008 football championships; notes that every major party in the Parliament has, at least in the past if not at present, supported such a joint bid; further notes the potential of the bid to bring all the benefits for tourism and the economy that would have resulted from a solo bid by Scotland without burdening the country with four expensive and unneeded 30,000-seater stadiums; looks forward to the opportunity of working and renewing ties with our Irish neighbours, and urges the whole country to back the bid. Supported by: Mr John McAllion, Bristow Muldoon, Johann Lamont, Trish Godman, Rhoda Grant, Dr Sylvia Jackson, Margaret Jamieson, Jackie Baillie*, Pauline McNeill*, Mr Tom McCabe*, Brian Fitzpatrick*, Irene Oldfather*
S1M-2812 Euro 2008 (lodged on 28 February 2002) Mr Michael McMahon*
S1M-2812 Euro 2008 (lodged on 28 February 2002) Mr Kenneth Macintosh*
S1M-2812 Euro 2008 (lodged on 28 February 2002) Helen Eadie*, Karen Whitefield*, Robin Harper*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-2812 Euro 2008 (lodged on 28 February 2002) Marilyn Livingstone*
S1M-2812 Euro 2008 (lodged on 28 February 2002) Bill Butler*, Karen Gillon*
